name: bustrack-sv
description: Sistema de Seguimiento de Flota de Buses - BusTrack SV

scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c green,blue "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:frontend:prod: cd frontend/web && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/web && npm install
scripts.test: echo "✅ No hay tests configurados aún. Ejecuta los servidores con: npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend/web && npm run build
